name: 2cprodeq2dv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, cprod(s1, c1, c2)), cprod(s0, c0, cprod(s1, c1, c3))))
-| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, prod(s1 ∈ c1, c2))= prod(s0 ∈ c0, prod(s1 ∈ c1, c3)))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, cprod(s1, c1, c2)), cprod(s0, c0, cprod(s1, c1, c3))))

-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, prod(s1 ∈ c1, c2))= prod(s0 ∈ c0, prod(s1 ∈ c1, c3)))
